name: PKPaymentPassActivationState
desc: Cases that indicate payment pass activation states.DeprecatedUse PKSecureElementPass.PassActivationState instead.

items.name: case activated
items.desc: Active and ready for payment use.

items.name: case requiresActivation
items.desc: Not active but may be activated by the issuer.

items.name: case activating
items.desc: Not ready for use but activation is in progress.

items.name: case suspended
items.desc: Not active and canâ€™t be activated.

items.name: case deactivated
items.desc: Not active because the issuer disabled the account associated with the device.
